ComicInfo.Summary:
The action heats up. As Zealot, Warblade, and Grifter confront the Daemonite Warlord, Helspont and his henchmen, the rest of the team is locked in mortal combat with the government's elite super-human strike force, Youngblood. Meanwhile, Master Gnome and the villainous Troika move into position for the endgame.
Youngblood faces off against WildC.A.T.s, as the WildC.A.T.s realize the Vice President of the United States is actually an evil Daemonite and will do anything to stop him. Since Youngblood is the VP's personal bodyguards, the ensuing fight is catastrophic. WildC.A.T.s try to inform the members of Youngblood of the VP's true self, but they are not willing to believe it. Meanwhile, some other WildC.A.T.s find Helspont and stop him from trying to take over the planet. Voodoo is able to exorcise the Daemonite from the Vice President's body, causing the battle between them and Youngblood to stop. However, Helspont has started to open a portal to allow more Daemonites to come to Earth so they can all take it over.
ComicInfo.Title: Reunification
